column2: ENGLISH
1230 is the most complete startdate.
Vampires have the most gameplay and flavor.
Iberia 1230 is a good place for a new player to the mod.
If you create a custom character, make sure he has the required traits. Look at a canon character to be sure.
As a vampire, your armies will start small, you must build your influence over the populace.
Cain can't be diablerized. Sorry.
Elders vampires are old for a reason. They won't fall to an ill prepared plot.
Technology has been overhauled into influence and is a crucial part of your growth.
Buildings as a vampire represent your influence over the populace, without them, you are all alone.
The first month of gameplay will be slow and see much death. That's intended.
To create a childe, right click on a mortal.
Mind the Masquerade. You wouldn't want to make the Chuch angry.
You can create ghouls easily, but it will cost you precious blood.
Mind your blood thirst. Feed and hunt mortals to replenish it.
You can bloodbound your prisoners to insure loyalty. Bloodbounds are unbreakable, right?
The more you age, the more you will be powerful. And the more everyone will hate you for it.
This is the World of Darkness. You have no friends, only pawns.
Rivals are very dangerous and must be dealt with to secure your unlife.
You will have very limited demesne and will need vassals. Don't trust them.
To be safe, expect everyone to be plotting your demise. They probably are anyway.
Plots have been overhauled and are nastier. Be a good schemer, or die trying.
Don't test a 4th of 5th generation in battle without being well prepared.
The Roman scholar, Seneca, was incorrect. Unjust dominion can be eternal. - Hardestadt
1230 is the most complete startdate.
Vampires have the most flavor and gameplay associated.
Iberia 1230 is a good place to learn the new features.
If you create a custom character, make sure he has the required traits. Look at a canon character to be sure.
As a vampire, your armies will start small, you must build your influence over the populace.
Cain can't be diablerized. Sorry.
Elders vampires are old for a reason. They won't fall to an ill prepared plot.
Technology has been overhauled into influence and is a crucial part of your growth.
Buildings as a vampire represent your influence over the populace, without them, you are all alone.
The first month of gameplay will be slow and see much death. That's intended.
To create a childe, right click on a mortal.
Mind the Masquerade. You wouldn't want to make the Church angry.
You can create ghouls easily, but it will cost you precious blood.
Mind your blood thirst. Feed and hunt mortals to replenish it.
You can bloodbind your prisoners to insure loyalty. Bloodbonds are unbreakable, right?
The more you age, the more you will be powerful. And the more everyone will hate you for it.
There is always a sire to direct us, and a sire beyond him, and so back to Caine. There is no 'destiny' for you to choose but what your masters allow for you.  - Montano
Without me there'd be no Sabbat. And without the Sabbat there'd be no Camarilla. The entire face of Cainite society is what it is because of me. - Gratiano
Each minor problem like a grain of sand, each night I inherit the desert. - Lacroix
To be safe, expect everyone to be plotting your demise. Actually, this is probably right anyway.
I was queen of the world once, and I will be again, I promise you. Now you have my permission to die.  - Petaniqua
We are not gods, no matter what we tell ourselves.There is no Godhead. The heart of the universe is empty. Will you walk through it with me? - Kemintiri
A soul is just another bit of clay, to be twisted between your fingers. - Sascha Vykos
Endings and beginnings have a way of blending and twisting until it is difficult to separate one from the other. - Anatole
You're a big bad vampire. Hey, great, congrats. Now keep it to yourself. - Smiling Jack
Mercenaries have special troops too: some are ghouls, some are werewolves, some are vampires, some are stranger things.
You can try to embrace Revenants, Fae, Mages and Werewolves into Vampires.  Tremere even have a ritual for Mage embraces.
Werewolves in a world dominated by Vampires is a hard start.
Larger population cities give Vampire princes more potential influence and larger broods of vampires.
Supernatural governments allow for holding any landed title without penalty
Mage Life Sphere 3+ gives immortality.
Ghouls can breed true and create Revenants--hereditary ghouls.
Majesty Summon, Majesty Entrancement, Dominate Mesmerize and Dominate Conditioning are very potent tools for Vampire princes.
Werewolves first change may happen sometime in adulthood.
Auspex Aura Perception shows some hidden traits.
Vampires, particularly Toreador, have more minor court titles than mortals.  Have you chosen primogen for each clan yet?
Secret cults are still very powerful.
Dire blood thirst can lead to frenzy or worse....
Auspex: Aura perception allow you to see the hidden hobbies of your neighbors. Might include impaling and random acts of cruelty.
You can awaken torpored elders of your dynasty... If you dare to do so.
Tremere, Koldun, Derech Lilit and Order of Hermes Mages can do hermetic quests.
Young vampires can lose their titles to old powerful and unlanded vampires in the nearby area.
1230 is the most complete startdate.
Iberia 1230 is a good place for a new player to the mod.
Vampires have the most gameplay and flavor.
Malkavian and Nosferatu make excellent spymasters.  They Sow Chaos when assigned to sabotage a province.
Many things including jobs, plots and factions are tied to your vampire's age and generation. The older and higher generation vampires have better results.
